title: What are two things that neighbors can share? - Quora

response.answer_text: Bachelor here! I have shared, my tools, lawnmower, pressure washer, car, you name it he has borrowed it. He has nothing that I can borrow. I feel taken advantage of. Hmmmm, wait a minute! There is something that he has that I would like to borrow. Do you think it would be ok if I asked could I borrow his wife? She is fine and I would like to borrow her pussy! Do you think he would be ok with my request?
Hellos and goodbyes! Nothing more. No joke.
